short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play a random song from common KPOP bands, such as BTS, Twice, and Red Velvet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a popup extension that allows you to choose from one of ten kpop bands and play a random youtube video from the band when you click the button at the top.
